Title: Morning Productivity Boost
Content: Started the day strong with a focused coding session. Cleaned up some Blazor components and finally fixed the modal state bug. Feeling good about the progress.

Title: Unity Beast System Breakthrough
Content: Made major progress on the ScriptableObject + JSON hybrid architecture. Runtime instances now cleanly separate from static templates. This is going to scale beautifully.

Title: Late Night Debugging
Content: Spent way too long chasing a null reference in the event modal. Turned out to be a missing parameter binding. Learned (again) to trust the logs.

Title: Blazor Styling Wins
Content: Finally got the purple theme consistent across forms. Scoped CSS was fighting me, but global styles cleaned everything up. The UI feels cohesive now.

Title: Weekend Planning
Content: Planning to refactor the event service layer and maybe sketch out some new lore ideas. Also need to remember to take a break and touch grass.
